question: Which state government is to set up its 1st vulture conservation centre?
explanation: In a major step to conserve the endangered vulture population, the Uttar Pradesh government will set up stateâ€™s first vulture conservation and breeding centre in farenda area of Maharajganj district. Environment Minister had recently told the Parliament that there has been a sharp decline in the population of vultures in the country which has come down from 40 million to 19,000 in a span of over three decades.
